sources.title: Rhythm Romance (1939)
sources.description: Bob Hope, Shirley Ross, Gene Krupa, Dudley Dickerson

metadata.Plot: Using a nightclub setting, Carl Hoff and His Orchestra provide the music. Band vocalist Barry McKinley sings, the Randall Sisters do their interpretation of "The Whirling Dervish." The Kidooders (Paul Cordner, Bil Kearnes, Eddie Lewis and Bob Remington) wind this Vitaphone short up with "Old MacDonald Had a Farm."
metadata.Actors: Carl Hoff, Carl Hoff Orchestra, Barry McKinley
